text:
I have a webapp I am building for a client...called psychmatters...I called it 
psych and its fine...psychmatters and it breaks 4.1.24 on winXP. I havent 
explored this problem to identify the exact number of chars necesary but you 
get the drift. However, when i run this on my linux server (4.1.18) the longer 
name works fine. This is repeatable behaviour.
creator: alex@lateralminds.com.au

text:
Please followup with tomcat-user - it is most likely a configuration issue. I
was able to create a webapp path with this name:

my_extremely_long_path_name_to_see_how_many_characters_I_can_make_a_webapp_name_to_test_bug_report_21342_to_see_if_it_is_valid_I_wonder_if_it_will_work
creator: funkman@joedog.org
